input.sentences: there was a ceremony by the memorial today .
cadets were dressed in their finest uniforms .
bystanders and alumni saluted them as they marched past .
important people wanted to shake their hands .
output.sentences: The sun shone on the ceremony grounds.
The soldiers made sure they looked their best.
The veterans looked on with pride.
The mayor came to watch the parade.
Everyone watching the parade could feel the pride.
